Hit Men
The hit men are part of the mafia. They choose a person to kill every night. The victim will be selected randomly from those the hit men choose.
You are a hit man! Your goal is to pick off civilians until there are fewer civilians than mafiosi.
Detectives

The detectives choose a person to learn about (have their alignment, mafia or civilian, revealed) every night. If there is more than one, they work separately, not knowing who the other detectives are.
You are a detective! Your goal is to figure out who the mafiosi are and convince everyone else to lynch them.
Double Agent
The double agent can kill one person and save one person per game.
You are the double agent! Your goal is to use your abilities to defeat the mafia.
Bodyguard
The bodyguard chooses a person to protect from the mafia every night.
You are the bodyguard! Your goal is to protect as many people as possible from the mafia.
Bomber
The bomber selects a target at the beginning of the round. If the bomber dies during the round, the target will die too.
You are the bomber! Your goal is to try and take down a mafioso with you if the mafia kills you.
Civilians
Civilians don\'t do anything at night.
You are a civilian! Your goal is to vote for the mafiosi during the day so they get lynched.
Matchmaker
At the beginning of the game, the matchmaker chooses two people to be in love. If one of them dies, the other will also.
You are the matchmaker! You don\'t really have a goal- you just make two people fall in love.
Official
The official chooses a person at night. That person\'s vote will count double the next day.
You are the official! Your goal is to give two votes to people who will vote for mafiosi during the day.
Suspects
The suspects are normal civilians; however, when investigated by a detective, they appear to be mafia.
Journalist
The journalist is a normal civilian; however, if killed, roles will no longer be announced when other players are killed.
Lawyer
The lawyer chooses a person every night to protect from lynching the following day.
You are the lawyer! Your goal is to defend innocent civilians from being lynched.
Town Gossip

The town gossip is a normal civilian; however, if a detective visits him/her, that detective will not be able to investigate anyone else that game. The town gossip will not be informed of his/her role.
Blackmailer
The blackmailer is part of the mafia. He/she chooses a person every night who will not be able to vote the next day.
You are the blackmailer! Your goal is to figure out who might vote for the mafia and keep them from voting.
Godfather
The godfather is a regular hit man, except he/she will appear to be innocent if investigated by a detective.
Poisoner
The poisoner is part of the mafia. He/she chooses a person to kill every night; that person will die unless visited by someone else that night.
You are the poisoner! Your goal is to poison civilians until there are fewer civilians than mafiosi.
Diplomat
The diplomat is a regular civilian, except he/she cannot be lynched.
You are the diplomat! Your goal is to vote for the mafiosi during the day so they get lynched.
Hermit
The hermit is a regular civilian, except he/she cannot be killed by the hit men.
You are the hermit! Your goal is to vote for the mafiosi during the day so they get lynched.
